00016 Component* LineRenderableCreator::createComponent(const string& name)

00018     LineRenderable* ret = new LineRenderable(name);

00023 Component* LineRenderableCreator::copyComponent(const string& name, Component* com)
00024 {
00025     LineRenderable* line = static_cast<LineRenderable*>(com);
00026 
00027     LineRenderable* copy = new LineRenderable(name);
00028 
00029     vector<Line> lines = line->getLines();
00030     for (int i = 0; i < lines.size(); ++i)
00031         copy->addLine(lines[i].point1, lines[i].point2, lines[i].color);
00032     SceneManager::get()->registerRenderableListener(copy);
00033 
00034     return copy;
00035 }
